property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Afghan service members meeting with Afghan leaders at a building site

note.text: Support your counterparts' efforts as they carry out plans you've collaborated on. Re-engage regularly, be prepared for problems to arise, and allocate resources where necessary.

If you feel your counterpart is overlooking details, plan early for any issues you foresee. If they choose to revise their strategy at a later date, you'll already have a plan in place to offer support.
